title: Mastery 6 and 7 tokens
body: Can you get mastery 6 and 7 tokens on aram? I just played a game got an s- and shouldve gotten a mastery 6 token but didnt get one. Can someone explain this?

replies.body: Mastery 6 and 7 tokens are currently only available in Summoner's Rift.  More specifically, normal and ranked SR per the [champion mastery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) guide.  Still, grats on some solid scores in ARAM.  :D
